demos.question: Are Smyrnium and Nymania both types of plant?
demos.reasoning: Yes, both Smyrnium and Nymania are types of plants. Smyrnium is a genus in the family Apiaceae, which includes flowering plants, while Nymania refers to a genus of flowering plants in the family Asparagaceae.

demos.question: That Darn Cat! and Never a Dull Moment were both produced by what studio?
demos.reasoning: Both "That Darn Cat!" and "Never a Dull Moment" were produced by Walt Disney Productions, which is known for its family-friendly films and animated features.

demos.question: What was the name of the man who Carol Kane played the wife of who was a lovable-but-goofy mechanic in a television series?
demos.reasoning: Carol Kane played the character of Simka Dahblitz-Gravas, who was the wife of Latka Gravas, a lovable-but-goofy mechanic in the television series "Taxi." The character of Latka was portrayed by Andy Kaufman.

demos.question: Are 7 World Trade Center and the Time Warner Center both located in New York City?
demos.reasoning: Yes, both 7 World Trade Center and the Time Warner Center are located in New York City. 7 World Trade Center is part of the World Trade Center complex in Lower Manhattan, while the Time Warner Center is located at Columbus Circle in Manhattan.
